short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly jump to the actual recipe - Skip the fluff.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of scrolling through paragraphs (and ads) to get to the actual recipe?

With RecipeLink, we find the recipe on the page and show a helpful button to jump straight to the recipe. No more blog post, no more ads!

FAQ:

Why didn't it work for my recipe?
RecipeLink is in Beta and may not work on all pages. Currently it just searches for the "Ingredients" section on the page, but not all Recipe sites may use this. Only English is currently supported, sorry!

Why do you need to read and change my data on all sites?
We can't list out every site that may contain a recipe, so instead we need to read the content of each page to determine if it's a recipe. Then, we need to modify the page content to add the button the jump straight to the recipe.
